items.sentence: I never for a moment imagined that I\'d be homeless.
Why didn\'t you tell me you were going to Australia?
Do you think that Tom would mind helping me do that?
Tom is upset with Mary because she didn\'t help him.
Tom is waiting for you to finish what you\'re doing.
What\'s the real reason you didn\'t want to do that?
I thought Tom had another hour to finish the report.
I thought Tom said that he liked this kind of music.
Tom doesn\'t need to come into the office on Monday.
There used to be a school across the street from us.
